item.description:
Get in the mood for spring and join us for the 13th annual Castleberry Spring Craft Festival. This is an indoor event at Rockingham Park Racetrack (Rte. 93 to exit 1), Saturday, March 27th at 10:00. Admission is $5.00 and I will check the website for discount tickets for $1.00 off which are not as yet posted. We can meet at the door to the main entrance for the park.

RSVP by 10:00 PM on March 26th

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Spring Craft Festival
